title: Corda REST Configuration Schema
description: Configuration schema for the REST section.

address.description: The address at which the REST API is exposed.

context.description: Settings for the context of the API.

description.default: Exposing REST interfaces as OpenAPI WebServices.

maxContentLength.description: The maximum length in bytes that can be sent over HTTP.

timeoutMs.description: The length of time in milliseconds that the backend message bus waits for a response to a remote operation before timing out the REST call.

idleTimeoutMs.description: The length of time in milliseconds that a websocket connection can be idle (no messages are either sent or received) before timing out and closing the connection. A value of 0 means such idle checks are disabled.
